title: I can't buy more runes?
body:
Been grinding out my runes because reasons

Its saying I ahve the max amount on runes that i don't own? 

Is this a bug or is there a max amount of total runes?

if there's a max amount of total runes is there a way i can remove my t2 runes?

replies.body: There is a cap to how many runes you can have!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll get your account tidied up!  :D  We'll get back to you as soon as we can.
